text: “Au gu daaligi hunu gau i goodou gadoo be dagu hai dela ne daaligi digau Sodom mo Gomorrah. Gei goodou ala guu llele gi daha, guu hai gadoo be tama bida laagau ulaula dela ne daa gi daha mo di ahi. Gei goodou digi huli hoou belee loomoi gi di Au.” Aanei la nnelekai mai baahi o Dimaadua.4.11 Genesis 19.24
